mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB(c_num, c_type, c_title, c_tag, c_people, c_recruit, c_period, c_date, c_place, c_content) VALUES(CLUB_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{c_type}, #{c_title}, #{c_tag}, #{c_people}, #{c_recruit}, #{c_period}, #{c_date}, #{c_place}, #{c_content})

SELECT CLUB_NO_SEQ.currval FROM dual
INSERT INTO CLUBIMAGE (CIMG_NUM , C_NUM , CIMG_PATH , CIMG_NAME) VALUES(CLUBIMAGE_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{c_num}, #{cimg_path}, #{cimg_name})
